#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<utility>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>

#define LL long long int
#define s(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define ss(a) scanf("%s",a)
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define f(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define fd(i,n) for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
#define p(a) printf("%d",a)
#define ps(a) printf("%s",a)
#define pc(a) printf("%c",a)
#define ent printf("\n")

using namespace std;

char s[100090],a[10090];

int main()
{
    int t,i;
    LL a,b,x,y,z;
     ss(s);
        x = strlen(s);
    s(t);
    w(t)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
        y = a%x;
        z = b%x;
        if(y==0)
            y=x;
        if(z==0)
            z=x;
        if(y==z)
            printf("Yes\n");
        else if(s[y-1]==s[z-1])
        {
            printf("Yes\n");
        }
        else
            printf("No\n");
    }
	return 0;
}
